recipesJson.name: Acropolis - Greek yogurt with apricot and a touch of orange
recipesJson.author: luadr
recipesJson.description:
A yammy, creamy greek yogurt with Apricot and a touch of orange
Both layers of the juice are very well balanced making this a creamy and fruity vape.
However, I regret that I couldn't get the tipical yogurt sourness
For me, the sweetness is on spot, but you can add CAP Super Sweet to suit your taste

To make this a frozen yogurt, add FA Polar Blast or TPA Liquid Mentol.

Visit DIY MIXERS CREW on Discord https://discord.gg/3K56qB
Follow DIY MIXERS CREW on FaceBook https://www.facebook.com/diymixers/
Join DIY MIXERS CREW on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/groups/456512471380574/
Watch DIY MIXERS CREW LIVE on YouTube every Sunday at 4:30 pm EST https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC1ENB0bSNrG_1KETYwZ154g

Please remember, smoking is dead, vaping is the present, mixing is the future ðŸ˜Š

reviews.text: I found this mix to be enjoyable. To me it is more like a strawberry shortcake ice cream bar with tones of apricot and a hint of orange instead of the strawberry. It also ages very well if you steep it longer with the creams and fruits developing more fully. It never really hit yogurt town for me, but is enjoyable none the less.
This is a wonderful bright, delicious profile. After vaping a lot of heavy bakeries, this was a welcomed change in flavor. Very well balanced and really enjoyed the orange. Very well done Luis!

Laudr, wow this mix caught me off my game. It is truly amazing. I loved the way you incorporated the orange into the mix. It brings the finished product to a whole new level. I'm not a yogurt fan but now I am!!!  Well done sir.
